DOC.brief_summary: Prospective observational study to evaluate the impact of Recto-Anal-Repair (a technique of ultrasound guided haemorrhoidal ligation) in the treatment of stage III/IV haemorrhoidal disease.
DOC.brief_title: Recto-Anal-Repair in the Treatment of Advanced Haemorrhoidal Disease
DOC.criteria: Stage III or IV hemorrhoidal disease (Appendix A) Patient age 1880 years old Patient fit for general or local anesthesia No prior surgical treatment for hemorrhoidal disease No prior surgical treatment for anorectal sepsis Signed informed consent Stage I or II hemorrhoidal disease (Appendix A) Patient unfit for surgery Clotting disorders Anal or colorectal malignancy Secondary hemorrhoidal disease Pregnancy Unwilling or unable to sign informed consent
